subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ebbets Field was home to the Dodgers until they left Brooklyn for Los Angeles after the 1957 season. The first game at Ebbets Field was an exhibition on April 5, 1913.
snippet: Ebbets Field was home to the Dodgers until they left Brooklyn for Los Angeles after the 1957 season. The first game at Ebbets Field was an exhibition on April 5, 1913.
